name: Team17 Trophy Hunters Pack
description:
Grab your blunderbuss and your straighten your deerstalker! Bringing together some of Team17's greatest hits into one incredible collection, there's enough gaming here for even the most seasoned trophy hunters!

Games included in this bundle:

Worms Battlegrounds - Bring friends and families together in the noble pursuit of self‐improvement, world domination and exploding sheep - it's everything a Worms fan could want!

Flockers - Guide your flock of trusting sheep through a deadly world of diabolical traps and horrific obstacles in this addictive puzzle game.

The Escapists - The award winning prison break simulation game. Master the routine, plan your strategy then execute your Escape.

The Escapists: The Walking Dead - Merging the award-winning, smash-hit, The Escapists with the worldwide phenomenon that is The Walking Dead, comes The Escapists: The Walking Dead.

LA Cops - A fast, action packed 3D top down shooter set to a theme of 70s Cops in LA trying to do a tough job in a tough town.
